experienceArr.title: Software engineer
experienceArr.desc: Developed React Native apps for aircrew to streamline workflows and improve communication. Automated key operational processes and built JavaScript add-ons for efficiency. Maintained backend systems and ensured connectivity between azal.az and internal servers. Supported critical airline software, led server migration to AzInTelecom, and integrated new IT systems. Implemented Grafana and Prometheus for system monitoring and created detailed IT documentation for consistent operations.

experienceArr.title: React js and React Native Developer
experienceArr.desc: Developed the 'Younified' mobile app (iOS & Android) using React Native, featuring post feeds with likes, comments, news, surveys, notifications, and profile editing. Co-developed the 'Down Syndrome CA' app, contributing to core functionality and UI design. Optimized app performance, integrated APIs, and enhanced the Younified.ca website for better user experience.

experienceArr.title: Senior Research Fellow
experienceArr.company: The ESRI - The Economic Scientific Research Institute
experienceArr.desc: Supported internal research and development projects within the institute. Contributed to economic analysis, policy evaluation, and institutional initiatives aimed at enhancing the effectiveness of applied economic research.

experienceArr.title: Frontend developer
experienceArr.desc: Built modern, responsive interfaces with React and turned complex ideas into smooth user experiences. Also taught JavaScript — helping others understand the language’s core logic and best practices. Hands-on with HTML, CSS, JS, and jQuery, always aiming for clean and efficient code.

experienceArr.title: React developer
experienceArr.desc: Worked on naftalanproducts.com, developing key pages, integrating APIs, and implementing authentication, multi-language support, and cart functionality. Improved SEO and optimized overall site performance.
